data

Class MessagePublish

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.Message
      • data.MessagePublish
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MessagePublication

    public class MessagePublish
extends Message
    Message sent from the publisher to the broker with the publication.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class data.Message

        Parameters:
        topic - The topic of the message.
        data - The data of the message stored in it's object form.
        charset - The charset for the fields of the message.
        Throws:

      • MessagePublish

        public MessagePublish(byte[] origin)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                      java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

        Not to be used by Middleware users to publish data!!

        Use the constructors with 2 or more parameters for that.

         Builds a publish message from the data received in it's plain byte form.
        Parameters:
        origin - The serialized MessagePublish.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Is thrown if the message type is not the correct one.
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - Is thrown if the selected charset is not known.
